name: Galaxy Shooter (angad363)
description:
A long time age, in a Galaxy far, far away.......

An immense battle between the Resistance and The First Order takes  place. Play as a Resistance Ship Pilot who has lost contact from the Resistance Base. Surrounded by Enemy Ships and Asteroids, survive til you can!

-Enemy Ships raging towards you, don't forget to shoot them or they may just increase in number.

-Destroy the Asteroids drawn towards this epic battle from the nearby Asteroid Field.

-Pickup Power Ups along the course of the game play to increase your survival chances.  

So come on you young pilot, get on this journey and destroy them all!
